name: Off The Rails (MundanePixel, Seth Weeks, Querpp, CreatureBox)
name_original: Off The Rails (MundanePixel, Seth Weeks, Querpp, CreatureBox)
description:
Off The Rails is an endless arcade train shooter made for the 9th Bored Pixel Game Jam.

Drive through the wasteland fighting enemies and collecting parts to grow your train and become more powerful.

Game By: Team Meat Wave

Anthony Drapeau (MundanePixel) - Art/Code/Design

Nicholas Junkas (CreatureBox) - Code/Design

Querpp - Sound

- Sample Pack

Seth Weeks (9onetwo) - Art/Code/Design

Font by: Maxi K
